term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - evolved gas analysis (EGA)
term.title: evolved gas analysis

item.text: A technique in which the nature and/or amount of volatile product(s) released by a substance subjected to a controlled temperature program is (are) determined. The method of analysis should always be clearly stated.
